WorkItem.Description: The plague scientist's boots, ilvl 264 ver, only show one gem slot by default. When loaded from armory they display correctly but during optimization it reverts back to one gem slot.

Comments.Message: Are you sure you have the right version marked for the optimizer?
Yes. There is no version of Plague Scientist's Boots with one socket in the game.

1) I saw that the item was defaulted with 1 gem, refreshed from the Armory and it added the second, works.
2) Forced the program to quit (so it wouldn't save the change) then did same thing but from wowhead, works.
3) Marked it as the only item available to the optimizer (rest of char is blank). Hit Optimize, it put the boots on and the socket data stayed as it should have.

Per that I am unable to reproduce the issue, it stays with 2 gems after having been refreshed.
Yep, did that myself and it works. The same thing happened in 2.3.5 I wonder if it reset when I upgraded? Thanks!
